item.title: Vintage Vegas: Remembering the Nevada Club Casino â€“ A Fremont Street Gem
item.description:
A Downtown Classic: The Nevada Club’s Rise on Fremont Street

Before the mega-resorts and sprawling Strip, downtown Las Vegas, known as Glitter Gulch, pulsed with a unique energy. Amongst its vital organs was the Nevada Club Casino, a now-vanished landmark located at 113 East Fremont Street. Squeezed between the Lucky Strike and the burgeoning Golden Nugget, the Nevada Club was a quintessential mid-century casino, a testament to a more approachable and boisterous era of Las Vegas gambling.
